mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COURSE_STUDENT ( course_student_seq, member_seq, start_date, end_date, times_week, is_delay, alias_list_full_name ) VALUES ( IFNULL( (SELECT MAX(course_student_seq) + 1 FROM GENERATE_SEQ) , 1 ) , #{member_seq}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{times_week}, 0, #{alias_list_full_name} );
mapper.select: SELECT TBL.* FROM ( SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(course_student_seq) FROM COURSE_STUDENT ) AS TOTAL_CNT, @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS NO, M.NAME, M.MEMBER_SEQ, CS.START_DATE, CS.END_DATE, CS.TIMES_WEEK, CS.IS_DELAY, CS.ALIAS_LIST_FULL_NAME FROM (SELECT @ROWNUM:= 0 ) dummy, COURSE_STUDENT CS LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_SEQ = CS.MEMBER_SEQ ) TBL WHERE (@ROWNUM:=0)=0 AND NO BETWEEN ( ( ( #{current_page} - 1 ) * 10 ) + 1 ) AND ( ( ( #{current_page} - 1 ) * 10 ) + 10 )
